channel.title: Lumbridge - Next generation of 317
channel.description:
Since mopar has the stupid double post patch other main things found here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html?tabid=28
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rsg5B.png[/img][/CENTER]
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/user/Lumbridge317?"][IMG]http://uwaterloo.ca/applied-health-sciences/sites/ca.applied-health-sciences/files/uploads/images/youtube-icon.gif[/img][/URL] BETA forums - lumbridge.x10.mx
What is Lumbridge? Lumbridge is a rsps completely custom and isn't a remake. The server will be economy based, players will have to trade each other for items (unless GE is implemented). I plan to purchase clan chat, all skills fully functional and working, game frame will be based on 508-525 as well. Lumbridge will strive to have the most content, and stability so all users can have a smooth game play and enjoy their time playing. One day hope to host this, but for now i'm no wheres near done. Please show support by 'thanking' the thread. Lumbridge forums also provides several activities alone, some of the features like:
[ul][*]Chat Box [*]Arcade + rewards to show off when posting [*]Lots of sections to choose from [*]Lots of usergroups to hopefully one day for the user to achieve[/ul]
Some of what the sever will achieve and or have in-game will consist of:
[ul][*]Dungeoneering [*]Lots of minigames [*]Fully funactional skills [*]Lots of traveling methods for getting around the server [*]Stability [*]PT - Player Trading (unless I implement GE) [*]Lots of bosses to kill to gain better items [*]Clan Chat[/ul]
There's so much more to this project then from what you may be reading, so overtime I will be frequently updating the thread! Please stay active on the thread so you don't miss out on any updates :)
Quick reserve browsing [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html#post3826020"]Skills[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html#post3826022"]Updates[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html#post3826023"]Media[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html#post3826025"]Support[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html#post3826029"]Misc[/URL]

item.title: Lumbridge - Next generation of 317
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

If you can’t tell us what’s your ‘development’ is in one post, you might as well not post at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge - Next generation of 317
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

Ruby:

Don’t really see why you need multiple posts for this? lol. Include it all in one post rather than making 4/5 separate ones. This is why R-S is more spammy than MoparScape.

It’s a person preference by a lot of people, except from here cause you cant even do it here
IMO for the reserve concept it helps make teh thread more organized rather then cramming everything into one big post.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

Since mopar has the stupid double post patch other main things found here
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/467460-lumbridge-next-generation-317-a.html?tabid=28

[CENTER]

rsg5B.png767×305
[/CENTER]


BETA forums - lumbridge.x10.mx

What is Lumbridge?
Lumbridge is a rsps completely custom and isn’t a remake. The server will be economy based, players will have to trade each other for items (unless GE is implemented).
I plan to purchase clan chat, all skills fully functional and working, game frame will be based on 508-525 as well.
Lumbridge will strive to have the most content, and stability so all users can have a smooth game play and enjoy their time playing.
One day hope to host this, but for now i’m no wheres near done. Please show support by ‘thanking’ the thread.
Lumbridge forums also provides several activities alone, some of the features like:

[ul][]Chat Box
[]Arcade + rewards to show off when posting
[]Lots of sections to choose from
[]Lots of usergroups to hopefully one day for the user to achieve[/ul]

Some of what the sever will achieve and or have in-game will consist of:

[ul][]Dungeoneering
[]Lots of minigames
[]Fully funactional skills
[]Lots of traveling methods for getting around the server
[]Stability
[]PT - Player Trading (unless I implement GE)
[]Lots of bosses to kill to gain better items
[]Clan Chat[/ul]

There’s so much more to this project then from what you may be reading, so overtime I will be frequently updating the thread!
Please stay active on the thread so you don’t miss out on any updates
